timeout_operation_mode_availability.description: If the input `operation_mode_availability` topic cannot be received for more than `timeout_operation_mode_availability`, vehicle will make an emergency stop.

timeout_call_mrm_behavior.description: If a service is requested to the mrm operator and the response is not returned by `timeout_call_mrm_behavior`, the timeout occurs.

timeout_cancel_mrm_behavior.description: If a service is requested to the mrm operator and the response is not returned by `timeout_cancel_mrm_behavior`, the timeout occurs.

use_emergency_holding.description: If this parameter is true, the handler does not recover to the NORMAL state.

timeout_emergency_recovery.description: If the duration of the EMERGENCY state is longer than `timeout_emergency_recovery`, it does not recover to the NORMAL state.

use_parking_after_stopped.description: If this parameter is true, it will publish PARKING shift command.

use_pull_over.description: If this parameter is true, operate pull over when latent faults occur.

use_comfortable_stop.description: If this parameter is true, operate comfortable stop when latent faults occur.

emergency.description: If this parameter is true, hazard lamps will be turned on during emergency state.
